text: Francesc Xavier Ciuraneta Aymí (12 March 1940 - 11 November 2020) was a Spanish Roman Catholic prelate. He was born in La Palma d'Ebre, Spain. He was the Bishop of Menorca from 1991 to 1999 and of Lleida from 1999 to 2007. Ciuraneta Aymí died on 11 November 2020 in La Palma d'Ebre from Parkinson's disease-related problems at the age of 80.Fallece Mons. Ciuraneta, obispo emérito de Lleida ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:Spanish Roman Catholic bishops
title: Francesc Xavier Ciuraneta Aymí
